Detailed Description

This class represents a basic Light object.

Other types of Light are inherited from this Light. Used as a standard, ambient light in OpenGL.

Author:
Ben Constable, original Java code by Oli Winks
Version:
1.0

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Light::Type

Type of Light, used to check type at runtime.

One for each in the inheritance heirarchy.
